quotes.quote: Age is just a number, but maturity is a choice. Unfortunately, I seem to have misplaced my maturity somewhere along the way.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: Life is like a box of chocolates, except I'm allergic to chocolate and life is full of surprises.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: I prefer to have my pain ignored than have no pain at all. Without pain there can be no real pleasure. Without the lows, you have no way to measure the highs
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: I have many thoughts that do often lie too deep for tears. At the moment, the main one being to put a bullet in your forehead
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: I had bullets, he had words. But when he was done talking, for the first time I truly understood which of those was more powerful.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: You and I both know thinking on your feet is not your strong suit Luther. You will make a mistake and when you do, I will be there to indulge in the undeniable pleasure and sweet satisfaction of 'I told you so.'
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: You know the problem with drawing lines in the sand? With a breath of air they disappear.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: You can't judge a book by its cover, but you can by its first few chapters, and most certainly by its last.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: I'm not a gum ball machine, Lizzie. You don't get to just twist the handle whenever you want a treat.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: Life is far too important a thing to ever talk seriously about.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: My friend here is still making the bed he'll have to lie in for the rest of his life.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: Value loyalty above all else.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: You have to make your choices; you have to be happy with them.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: When you love someone, you have no control. That's what love is. Being powerless.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: Revenge isn't a passion, it's a disease that eats at your mind and poisons your soul.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: Dead? Pishposh. What's death? It's just a process, right
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: Once you cross over, there are things in the darkness that can keep your heart from feeling the light again.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: There is nothing that can take the pain away. But eventually, you will find a way to live with it.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: The world can be such an unsparingly savage place one can be forgiven for believing that evil will triumph in the end.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: God can't protect you, but I can.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: As you well know, one of the keys to my success is a clear and consistent understanding of my own limitations.
quotes.author: Raymond Radington

quotes.quote: As bad as you think I am, as far as you think I'm willing to go to protect that which I hold dear
quotes.author: Raymond Radington
